title: Bandelier National Monument: Ponderosa group Campground reservations
body: Ponderosa Group Campground Reservations       Reservations are required for Ponderosa Group Campground, where camping is limited to groups of 10 people or more. Demand is high for this campground, which only has two sites. Cost for a site in this campground is $35/night or $35/day-use for a reserved campsite. For a reservation, go to www.recreation.gov or you can call 1-877-444-6777. Click here for more information on Ponderosa Group Campground. No reservations are required, or taken, for the Juniper Campground as 100% occupancy is very rare. But there are Reservations are taken for two sites in the Abert's squirrel loop which are reserved for small groups (10 - 20 people). The cost for these group sites is $35/night. Reservations for these group sites are available at www.recreation.gov or you can call 1-877-444-6777.
